jobDescription: Job Description Position at ITW CorporateThe Data Analyst willsupport the corporate HR department in the management and analysis of multiple data sources and programs interacting internally with Workday (HRIS), Payroll, Finance, Legal and externally with multiple vendors (e.g. Blue Cross/Blue Shield, CVS/Caremark, IBM Watson, Empyrean Benefit Solutions, etc.).
